title: Mobile Learning (mLearning) Content Design: Evidence-Based and Universal Design Application

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and basic mobile device usage skills
context.additional_context: The goal is to develop capabilities in designing mobile learning solutions to strengthen educational continuity post-COVID-19. Acquiring methods to optimize science content design in VR/simulation environments.

learning_goals: Scientific simulation content can be designed according to universal design principles in mobile environments.
Mobile content can be produced to enhance learning effectiveness by applying evidence-based design strategies.
An mLearning prototype can be developed that reflects diverse learner needs (visual/auditory/cognitive accessibility).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
